remarks.p:
Usage example:
<hbm2ddl connectionprovider="NHibernate.Connection.DriverConnectionProvider" dialect="NHibernate.Dialect.MsSql2000Dialect" connectiondriverclass="NHibernate.Driver.SqlClientDriver" connectionstring="server=(local);uid=sa;pwd=sa;database=MyProject" delimiter=" GO " outputtoconsole="false" exportonly="true" formatnice="true" outputfilename="${nant.project.basedir}/sql/schema.sql"> <assemblies> <include name="${nant.project.basedir}/bin/MyProject.dll" /> </assemblies> </hbm2ddl>

member.name: P:NHibernate.Tasks.Hbm2DdlTask.ConnectionProvider
member.summary: Gets or sets the connection provider. NHibernate.Connection.DriverConnectionProvider is the default

member.name: P:NHibernate.Tasks.Hbm2DdlTask.Dialect
member.summary: Gets or sets the dialect. NHibernate.Dialect.MsSql2000Dialect is the default

member.name: P:NHibernate.Tasks.Hbm2DdlTask.ConnectionDriverClass
member.summary: Gets or sets the connection driver class. NHibernate.Driver.SqlClientDriver is the default.

member.name: P:NHibernate.Tasks.Hbm2DdlTask.ConnectionString
member.summary: Gets or sets the connection string used to access the ddl.

member.name: P:NHibernate.Tasks.Hbm2DdlTask.Delimiter
member.summary: Gets or sets the delimiter. GO is the default.

member.name: P:NHibernate.Tasks.Hbm2DdlTask.OutputToConsole
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the schema should be outputted to the console
member.value: to output to the console; otherwise, .

member.name: P:NHibernate.Tasks.Hbm2DdlTask.ExportOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the schema ddl script should only be exported or if it should be executed on the database server.
member.value: if only output the script; otherwise, - Execute the script on the db server.

member.name: P:NHibernate.Tasks.Hbm2DdlTask.DropOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether only the drop script should be executed
member.value: if only drop objects; otherwise, - Drop and Create objects.

member.name: P:NHibernate.Tasks.Hbm2DdlTask.FormatNice
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ddl script should be formatted nicely
member.value: for nice format; otherwise, - One statement per line.

member.name: P:NHibernate.Tasks.Hbm2DdlTask.OutputFilename
member.summary: Gets or sets the filename to write the ddl schema script to.

member.name: P:NHibernate.Tasks.Hbm2DdlTask.Assemblies
member.summary: Gets or sets the assemblies load with embedded *.hbm.xml resources.
